```{r}
f= read_csv("Data/data_passage_ques_options_pv.csv")
f_ques_embed= read_csv("Data/question_embed.csv")
f_option1_embed= read_csv("Data/option_embed1.csv")
f_option2_embed= read_csv("Data/option_embed2.csv")
f_option3_embed= read_csv("Data/option_embed3.csv")
f_option4_embed= read_csv("Data/option_embed4.csv")
names(f_ques_embed)= c("id",paste0("ques_embed", 1:769))
names(f_option1_embed)= c("id",paste0("option1_embed", 1:769))
names(f_option2_embed)= c("id",paste0("option2_embed", 1:769))
names(f_option3_embed)= c("id",paste0("option3_embed", 1:769))
names(f_option4_embed)= c("id",paste0("option4_embed", 1:769))

f.with.embed= bind_cols(f,f_ques_embed)

```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
